title: Icons
caption: List of all icons from Marigold.

body.raw:
Select a Marigold icon and use it as described [here](../../components/icon)
or click on an Icon in the list to copy them as `<svg>` Element.

## UI

<IconList
  icons={[
    'ArrowUp',
    'ArrowRight',
    'ArrowDown',
    'ArrowLeft',
    'ChevronUp',
    'ChevronRight',
    'ChevronDown',
    'ChevronLeft',
    'SettingDots',
    'Check',
    'Add',
    'Remove',
    'IconMore',
    'Search',
    'SquareUnchecked',
    'SquareChecked',
    'ExternalLink',
    'Eye',
    'Filter',
    'BurgerMenu',
    'Delete',
    'Close',
    'CircleUnchecked',
    'CircleChecked',
  ]}
/>

## Info

<IconList
  icons={[
    'Accessible',
    'AutoRenew',
    'Banned',
    'BatteryCharging',
    'BatteryFull',
    'BatteryHalf',
    'BatteryEmpty',
    'Bus',
    'Calendar',
    'Camera',
    'Clock',
    'Direction',
    'Email',
    'EventDate',
    'Exclamation',
    'Feedback',
    'Food',
    'Globe',
    'Home',
    'Info',
    'Marker',
    'MobilePhone',
    'MobileSignal',
    'Notification',
    'Parking',
    'Required',
    'ResaleLogbook',
    'Spinner',
    'Thumb',
    'Truck',
    'Wifi',
  ]}
/>

## Action

<IconList
  icons={[
    'Cancel',
    'Crop',
    'Edit',
    'FormatBold',
    'FormatItalic',
    'FormatSize',
    'HighlightOff',
    'Picture',
    'Location',
    'Lock',
    'LockOpen',
    'Logout',
    'Pause',
    'PauseAlt',
    'Play',
    'PlayAlt',
    'Restart',
    'ResaleEdit',
    'RotateLeft',
    'RotateRight',
    'Save',
    'Sort',
    'SortDown',
    'SortUp',
    'Star',
    'Stop',
    'Underlined',
    'Zoom',
  ]}
/>

## Ticketing

<IconList
  icons={[
    'Deal',
    'DesignTicket',
    'GiftCard',
    'Membership',
    'Pickup',
    'Price',
    'Resale',
    'Scanner',
    'Seat',
    'Selling',
    'Ticket',
    'TicketInsurance',
    'Turnstile',
  ]}
/>

## User

<IconList
  icons={[
    'User',
    'Group',
    'Cart',
    'CreditCard',
    'SmilieVerySatisfied',
    'SmilieSatisfied',
    'SmilieNeutral',
    'SmilieDissatisfied',
    'SmilieVeryDissatisfied',
    'Id',
  ]}
/>

## Social

<IconList
  icons={['Facebook', 'Google', 'Instagram', 'Share', 'Twitter', 'Whatsapp']}
/>
